Class FoliaScheduler

java.lang.Object
com.janboerman.invsee.folia.FoliaScheduler
All Implemented Interfaces:
Scheduler
public class FoliaScheduler extends Object implements Scheduler
Scheduler implementation based on GlobalRegionScheduler, AsyncScheduler and EntityScheduler.
